english: to ask questions at any time
the   teacher   permits   asking questions at any time
to work from home on Fridays

chinese: 公司允许在周五居家办公
english: the  company  permits  working from home on Fridays
to  listen  to  music  during  the break

chinese: 在休息期间听音乐(ing形式)
english: listening  to  music  during  the break

chinese: 老师允许在休息期间听音乐
english: the teacher permits listening to music during the break

chinese: 听音乐或者玩游戏(ing形式)
english: listening  to  music  or  playing games

chinese: 老师允许在休息期间听音乐或，者玩游戏
english: the teacher permits listening to music or playing games during the break

chinese: 老师允许在这个测验期间使用，计算器

to drink water before the blood test

chinese: 在血液测试之前喝水(ing形，式)
english: drinking water before the blood test

chinese: 医生允许在血液测试之前喝水
english: the  doctor  permits  drinking water before the blood test

chinese: 你拥有一个有效的执照
如果你拥有一个有效的执照
english: if you have a valid license

chinese: 政策允许开车如果你拥有一个，有效的执照

chinese: 你拥有一个有效的护照
如果你拥有一个有效的护照

chinese: 我们不允许在办公室里抽烟
english: we don't permit smoking in the office

english: we  prohibit  smoking  in  the office

chinese: 我们禁止在公共场所抽烟
和一个有效的执照一起驾驶

to drive without a valid license
the   law   prohibits   driving without a valid license

english: 1. 老师允许在音乐课唱歌或者跳舞。 2. 政策禁止日落之后在大海里游泳。
soundmark: /政策禁止日落之后在大海里游泳。/

english: 1.The teacher permits singing or dancing in the music class. 2.The policy prohibits swimming in the sea after sunset.
